[Skip to content](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/#MainContent)



Pause slideshow



Play slideshow



**🎨 Turn Your Pet Into Art • Free Shipping on Premium Orders • Every Portrait Helps a Shelter Dog**

**✨Custom Pet Portraits Starting at $19 • Fast Turnaround • 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed**

🐕 Custom AI Pet Portraits • 24-48 Hour Preview • Free Shipping on $100+ • Every Order Helps a Shelter Dog

🐕 Custom AI Pet Portraits • 24-48 Hour Preview • Free Shipping on $100+ • Every Order Helps a Shelter Dog

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/people/Taylored-Pet-Portraits/61579179614717/# "   Taylored Pet Portraits on Facebook   ")
[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tayloredpetportraits/ "   Taylored Pet Portraits on Instagram   ")
[TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@tayloredpetportraits?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc "   Taylored Pet Portraits on TikTok   ")

Dog Person


Cat Person


## Forget the flowers; Get them a Valentine’s gift they’ll never forget.

Available in both Digital files only or Digital files + Canvas!


[Shop Valentine's Collection](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/collections)

[![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/resource_b8DTHhbg140ehJrMDavkWx.png?v=1767313441&width=1200)](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/collections)

Pet Portraits With A Purpose


## Taylored To Help

For every portrait you order, we create one for a deserving shelter dog and help them find their forever home.


[Learn More](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/pages/taylored-to-help)

[![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/Generated_Image_October_07_2025_-_2_48AM-2.jpg?v=1759853520&width=1200)](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/pages/taylored-to-help)

## 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

Get custom portraits in your chosen theme within 24-48 hours. Unlimited revisions - review, request changes, and approve your favorite before we print or ship.



See Our Gallery


![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/Untitled_design-3.png?v=1759853425&width=1200)

Go Digital or Get It Printed—You Choose


## Go Digital or Get It Printed—You Choose

Start with digital-only files to print yourself, or add canvas prints, ornaments, mugs, and more. Upgrade anytime—every portrait includes your digital file.


[Start Your Portrait](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/pages/packages)

[![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/digital_to_print_pet_portrait_dog_spa_day_personality.png?v=1759311736&width=1200)](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/pages/packages)

## Popular categories

[Valentines Day Collection](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/collections/valentines-day-collection)

[Canvas Pet Portraits](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/collections/physical-products)

[Digital Pet Portraits](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/collections/digital-pet-portraits)

![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/preview_images/1fb032867952464cbe5fd4f0ff087d07.thumbnail.0000000000_500x.jpg?v=1759433270)

## Drag the slider to see the Transformation!

![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/CleanShot_2025-10-01_at_12.22.55.png?v=1759506503&width=2000)

![Spa Day](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/dog_bath_robe_towel_wrapped_head_cucumber_spa.jpg?v=1759441156&width=2000)

### Our mission

_Increase adoptions_

Every portrait funds professional photos for shelter dogs, increasing their chances of adoption by up to 100%.

### Guaranteed Accuracy

Made with specialized AI, capturing every unique detail.

Missing eyes, crooked ears, distinctive markings—we get them RIGHT in 24-48 hours.

### Unlimited Revisions

Not satisfied with your result? We will work with you until we get it right

## Loved by pet parents in Texas and beyond

> ★★★★★
>
> Quick turnaround and amazing quality. The canvas is the centerpiece of our living room.
>
> ![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/CleanShot_2025-10-04_at_03.20.28.png?v=1759566037&width=720)
>
>
> Lisa L.
>
>
>
> Denton, TX

> I'm usually hesitant to buy custom artwork for my dog because he only has one eye and they rarely get it right. Taylored pet portraits nailed it.
>
> ![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/Mac_c3040af6-0b1e-4a49-92d7-c5b50b641c1f.png?v=1764796061&width=720)
>
>
> Sarah's Mom
>
>
>
> Dallas, TX

> The portrait captured our dog's playful spirit perfectly. We've gotten so many compliments!
>
> ![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/Portrait_2.png?v=1764196399&width=720)
>
>
> Joel & Carrie
>
>
>
> Fort Worth, TX

> I love that you guys help shelter dogs. That made it an easy decision!
>
> ![](https://tayloredpetportraits.com/cdn/shop/files/CleanShot_2025-10-22_at_15.41.46.png?v=1764196424&width=720)
>
>
> Marcus
>
>
>
> Austin, TX

Custom AI Pet Portraits \| Taylored Pet Portraits \| Denton, TX

metadata.og:description: Transform your beloved pet into stunning AI-generated custom portraits at Taylored Pet Portraits. Professional quality digital art featuring your dog, cat, or any pet. Fast delivery in Denton, TX and nationwide shipping. Order your unique pet portrait today!
